titles.title: Rural Economic Investment Act of 2004
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income interest received on loans secured by agricultural real property.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/5/2004--Introduced. Rural Economic Investment Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income interest received by a bank or savings association that is insured under the Federal Deposit Insurance Act on a loan secured by agricultural real estate or by a leasehold mortgage on agricultural real estate (real property used for agricultural production or certain single family rural residences).
